title: Process a Container for De-stuffing at CFS
description: A container with goods for multiple owners (LCL) arrives at the Container Freight Station (CFS) to be unloaded.

tasks.description: Receive the container at the CFS and verify its seal is intact.
tasks.expected_outcome: CFS clerk confirms the container number and that the seal matches the documentation.

tasks.description: Break the seal and create a work order for a forklift gang to de-stuff the container.
tasks.expected_outcome: A work order is created to unload the contents of the container.

tasks.description: As cargo is unloaded, check it against the manifest and assign it to a storage location in the warehouse.
tasks.expected_outcome: Each piece of cargo is tallied, inspected for damage, and stored, with its location logged in the warehouse management system.
